creditline: Gift of Marko M. Bartholomew in heartfelt memory of my Romanian heritage and my father Howard and my grandfather Max Lorberbaum
description: tunic with a tan field; body has vertical thin red and blue striping; shoulders and around waist supplementary weft patterning of bands decorated in blue and red geometric designs; cloth design in red and blue around neck with ribbons of fabric grouped along edges (extensions of the design)
title: Tunic (Küshung)
